front.title: RTP Payload Format for RGL Codec

abstract.t: This document describes the RTP payload format and the storage modeformat for the RGL Codec (Version 1.0.0) described indraft-ramalho-rgl-desc-01.txt [4] and documented fully atwww.vovida.org [12]. The necessary details for the use of the RGLcodec with SDP are included in this document.
